moduleTitle: Internship in Recording Arts and Sciences
moduleDescription: The internship module provides opportunity for hands-on learning in a professional context. Students will intern in a local radio or TV station, recording studio, production house, A/V support company, live sound company, or other approved audio-related business. The knowledge and experiences gained will be documented in a final essay of substantial length.
faculty: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
department: YONG SIEW TOH CONSERVATORY OF MUSIC
